title: Programming and Philosophy: Beyond the Code
description:
Philosophy and programming intersect more than you could think.
This talk explores how philosophical principles can benefit programmers in addressing any challenge.

We’ll start by examining key philosophical concepts, showing their relevance to our day-to-day job. 
We'll see how philosophy can help navigate issues like ethics, AI, and developers' responsibilities.

Historically, programmers have engaged with philosophical questions, it's clear that philosophy is a crucial tool for addressing our profession's complexities, especially in 2024.

This talk is accessible to all programming levels, with no prior philosophical or programming knowledge required. Attendees should come with an open mind, ready to explore new perspectives.
